settings.content:
Awkwardness gives me great comfort. I‚Äôve never been cool, but I‚Äôve felt cool. I‚Äôve been in the cool place, but I wasn‚Äôt really cool ‚Äì I was trying to pass for hip or cool.

A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous. I am convinced that there can be luxury in simplicity. I wanted to dress the woman who lives and works, not the woman in a painting. It‚Äôs hard to balance everything. It‚Äôs always challenging. My relationships with producers or photographers ‚Äì these are relationships that took years. I can‚Äôt get sucked into that celebrity thing, because I think it‚Äôs just crass. My aim is to make the poor look rich.

Developed by Goop founder, wellness advocate and - academy award-winner, Gwyneth Paltrow, this high performing skincare line is where luxury formulas meet pure organic ingredients and the results are skin-changing.

Goop is passionate about the idea that beauty comes from the inside out. So they use clinically proven and best-in-class ingredients at active levels to create skin care, skin-boosting ingestibles, and body essentials that are luxurious, deliver high-performance results, and enliven the senses with exquisite textures and beautiful scents.
